I will continue visiting her till my health is cured and shall keep in touch with her in future as well.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: We want to express our heartfelt gratitude for her treatment. She has excellent surgical experience . She is friendly, attentive, cooperative,  Going forward, I always recommend her name for any critical Gynaecological problems.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
We are grateful to Dr. Irina Dey for her excellent treatment as well as excellent surgical experience which she applied with our patient Mrs.Sahajadi Begam and returned her from a very serious condition to a healthy normal life within a very short period.Our heartiest blessings and dua for Dr.Irina Dey .We pray to God for Dr. Mam as if she can go miles after miles as a successful, efficient surgeon and in this way she can help lacks of serious patients to get back to their normal healthy life.We wish Dr.Irina Dey for her all success and all goodness for her family.

Mehbub Mondal , husband of the patient Mrs.Sahajadi Begam who was admitted at AMRI Hospital under Dr.Irina Dey.

tags: Doctor friendliness,
review: The overall experience was good, I have received good treatment as well as good medical care. I would certainly recommend my friends and relatives to visit the hospital and get treated under Dr Irina dey for gynaecology issues.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review:
At first my wife was being monitored by another doctor till her first five months of pregnancy then, the first bump arrived and we had to change the doctor. We were in helpless then. Suddenly one of my colleague has advised me that I may visit Dr. Irina Dey. I was not sure, but the very first time we visited her, the way she has advised, taken away all our tension. We have followed her advice completely. 
However with the final scan on 33rd week, some complications were observed and that was the second bump. We were into mental trauma but again, Dr. Dey has taken more than half an hour to speak to us and helped us with all the necessary advice, which has boosted our experience. She gave best of the medicines and clarified all our doubts. In next 4 weeks, the complication has disappeared and I became a proud father of a healthy baby.

I would be always thankful to Dr. Dey for her extraordinary support.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: *** ***** *** ** ******** *** **** ****** ** ***** **** *** for my wife's irregular menstruation problem. We were planning for a baby & Doc started the treatment in that direction. The journey of last 1 year (almost) was fabulous to say the least. The doc was too much caring & precautious in each & every step. She is confident, very friendly, has complete foresight of what she is doing & why she is doing. She communicates & explains each & everything to us. She would earn some extra brownie points for her protectiveness. She is so much caring that sometimes you feel like you are consulting your friend /relative who's also a doctor. That is very rare in today's time. We are blessed with a baby girl under her supervision at AMRI Dhakuria last week in these hard times of Covid pandemic. However, the consultation doesn't end here. She is doing the follow up checkups that would last for one more year. Let me tell you once again that, Doc. Dey is the best doctor you can consult. Meeting her was possibly the second best thing that happened to us (the birth of our child being the obvious first) during the pregnancy planning. I would recommend everyone to consult the Doc. Be rest assured you'd be in safe hands.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: We went to Dr Irina Dey for diagnosis of Uterine Fibroids. Doctor was very good in diagnosing the issue and initially prescribed medication to resolve the issue without any surgery. But since the medication didn't resolved the issue properly, Doctor suggested for TAH+BSO surgery. The surgery was done by Doctor herself and it was done successfully without any complications. Doctor had been very supportive and cooperative with patient and family throughout the process, both pre and post operative care. A big thanks to Dr. Irina and AMRI hospital Dhakuria for the wonderful experience.

tags: Treatment satisfaction,Explanation of the health issue,Doctor friendliness,Value for money,
review: ** ***** *** ** * *** ** ******* She is very friendly and experienced.  I am about to leave for studies in abroad in less than a month. In the meantime I was diagnosed with ovarian cyst and she suggested me for the immediate OT. I was very scared because of the post complications and about recovery duration but trust me after exactly 1 week of OT I'm writing this, here I am with very mild pain in my stomach and facing zero problems in walking and doing almost any activity.  It doesn't seem like I underwent a surgery few days back.  I am so happy with her overall treatment, even after post treatment the way she kept the record of my health is so overwhelming.  I would highly recommend her to anybody for any gynecological treatment.

tags: Treatment satisfaction,Explanation of the health issue,Doctor friendliness,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
Dr. Irina Dey is an excellent doctor. I felt confident enough to go through the surgery after being explained about the condition and the details of the surgical procedure by her. Post operative care was very good and the surgery wounds healed painlessly.
Post operative pain was minimal and the stitches healed very well. I am feeling blessed to have been treated by such a competent doctor. I would like to thank Doctor Irina Dey and AMRI Hospital for handling my case with such care and expertise.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
context: Pregnancy Check Up,Post Pregnancy Classes,Complicated Pregnancy Treatment,
review:
I want to give 10 stars . As a woman we do not know what is happening within ourselves. I went through stress post pregnancy and nobody was able to understand until I went to Doctor Irina Dey. I have immense respect for her as she guided me by not giving depression pills unlike other doctors. She rightly pointed my illness, corrected it with proper guidance and medication. And on top of it ,if you need a friend whom you can openly talk at the time of pregnancy/any gynaecology issue, you can go to her. 
I’ve visited for pregnancy planning. Doctor is extremely well spoken and listens to the problem and gives solution. She is very positive which helps the me to be confident. She is always reachable over phone for any queries. I delivered a baby boy under her treatment.
Also she support me for my postpartum journey still under her observation for a healthy future.
People can reach her @ AMRI Dhakuria and Serum Analysis Center Gariahat.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: Myself Mrs. Upasana Roy Banerjee, am having some complications regarding peegnancy.As i am having medicines of a neuro problem, it may affect brain and neural tube of my baby...i visited one reputed doctor of kolkata some days ago but she suggested for immediate abortion....i was mentally broken untill i visited dr. Irina dey today...She gave me ray of hope..She suggested me not to abort but she will do regular tests to check baby's health condition...today after visiting her chamber i m feeling a bit relaxed...thank u madam

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: Dr. Irina Dey was a God send doctor in our life. From the very beginning, she was super supportive regarding pregnancy counseling and checks. Always having her calm and friendly nature, shes takes the patient into confidence and boosts patient’s moral a lot and that helps to relieve stress. She is also a very comprehensive doctor without having any bias for any specific course of medicine. Like at times, she has given us some alternative medicine and suggestions which worked wonderfully. Also, she never asked for unnecessary  tests or check ups and only did those which were required. With zero hesitation, I can recommend Dr. Irina Dey for any couple who needs consultation during pregnancy or trying to be pregnant.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,
review:
Dr. Is very good
But too much waiting in AMERI
Due to deliberate slow documentation & processing
The receptionist is very rude & won't  convey information... AMRI took 150 registration fee but didn't give card ( they said machine not working) 
**** **** *** ***** ****** ***** ** **** ***** ** **** ** **** ******* Also they don't follow the appointment order, I was asked to come at 3:50 but after arriving.. Was said it's 1st come 1st serve policy. In that case I would had come earlier in morning , had I know. Practice please make a note of this miss communication. If it's 1st come 1st serve... Then what's the point of giving time specific appointment . Hope my feedback will help others.

tags: Doctor friendliness,
review: I had to undergo a very critical surgery in which my uterus, urinary bladder and gut had got entangled. Dr. Irina Dey sorted this adhesion through a difficult surgery that lasted four hours. She came to visit me in the cabin everyday during my stay in the hospital boosting me with her pep talk and confidence. She always answered my phone calls whenever there was an emergency after discharge guiding me through the ordeal towards recovery. She's the embodiment of compassion, confidence and cure. God bless her always. A doctor whose very presence is enough to cure a patient.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review:
My mother, Sutapa Ray Chaudhuri was suffering from post menopausal abnormal bleeding and I got to know about Dr. Irina from practo. I must say her friendly nature pacified initial panick in my mother. She is very approachable and explains everything in layman's terms so that anyone from non medical background understands easily. Her treatment protocol are very modern and my mother suffered minimal pain post OT and during the entire treatment . Most importantly my mother had immense confident on her to go for surgery at her age. I wish all the very best to Dr. Irina and will definitely consult her in future and recommend her to all my acquaintances. 

Thanks
Upama Ray Chaudhuri

tags: Explanation of the health issue,
review: Very nice, ************* *** confident doctor. Went to her with the hope to cure my Dermoid cyst medical condition and the conversation I had withDr. Irina made me immediately decide for a laparoscopic removal. I got released the day after the surgery and was back to my feet within another couple of days…so far so good, I thank my doctor and recommend her very highly.

Right from day one she came across as a friendly yet straightforward person who has guided me through my pregnancy journey without any hassles. She patiently listens to any problem and explains and advises her patients accordingly without creating any unnecessary panic. I am really thankful to her for helping me deliver a healthy little baby, my bundle of joy.

Her positive approach of treatment is the best part of her.. patiently listening the patient's  problem is one of her great quality...  Thank q madam.. very much for everything..

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: From where I will start .... its been my luck to find doc like Irina Dey ... still my wife is under her treatment ... except her treatment procedure I will say about her friendliness... lots of humor which make patient party very comfortable...secondly I want to tell that she is such kind of doc who can give lots of time to listen all problem of patient & give particular answer and never try to escape from any question .... third I will say one of the best responsible doc towards her patient.. . Fourth I will say financially very effective as her prescribed medicine always under control and also replaceable... I will definitely suggest to Doc Irina Dey for any kind of Gyno issue .... there is also other lots of positive which you can feel once you visit her once ... I can assure you that once you visit her then you will never change the doc ...

review: This is the doctor which I am looking for.. Dr. Irina Dey mam you are just awasome.. They way u supported us while we are planning for baby I totally remembered all your word's. Thank you for everything. when you used to give us the hope and advice that what needs to be done and that mind-blowing words "yes one day we will have our baby in our hand". Yes now my wife is pregnant and a big thanks to God and you. Now only me and my wife Sudheshna only counting the date.. which is comming soon. Only one request mam please always stand just next to us as our respected mam and didi vai... I always recommend Irina mam.. I believe who ever will go to her they will have to say one word that is.. she is really nice doctor along with a nice human being...Thanks
